Posts.Title: Is it a fibroadenoma or Cancer or something else? Greenshamrock jan-jan

Posts.Content: Mar 2, 2012 08:32AM - edited Mar 2, 2012 08:33AM by MarineWife16 hearing that most fibroadenomas are in the upper part of the breast just gave me so much relief. It kind of helps with my situation. I had researched and researched fibroadenomas and hadnt seen it anywhere, so heres to fibroadenomas! haha
Posts.Title: Is it a fibroadenoma or Cancer or something else? Greenshamrock jan-jan

Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2012 05:27PM - edited Mar 3, 2012 05:28PM by MarineWife16 i agree with momof3boys, you need to push for more answers to help ease the pain and anxiety. i doubt they will do a mammogram because youre only 26, im 25 and they refused a mamogram for me but a ultrasound,mri, anything to help get you some answers. i found the best advice ladies here have given me is to be my own advocate because we know our bodies best. Its better to be safe then sorry. Good luck.
